title: Need to know RP price of...
body: Need to know RP Price for the upcoming Champion Camille and her bundle, will her bundle price be 1837RP with Program Camille?

replies.body: If Program Camille is a 1350RP skin then the bundle will be the usual price for champions who have a 1350RP release skin. If that's 1837RP, then yes.
However it is unlikely that a release skin will be 1350RP, so I would assume it would be the level below, whichever that may be.

Dude, this ain't season 3 lol, so your statement is invalid, also i checked, every champ that was released with a 1350 skin was bundle for 1837(Champion 50% off), so by that logic it be (975 / 2 + 1350) (487 + 1350 = 1837)
Riot practically always makes the release skin either 520RP or 975RP.  don't know of a case where a champion's release skin has been more than 975, and I've been around since the end of season 3.

> [{quoted}](name=EzeBlood,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=KWY1HmZb,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2016-11-27T05:24:29.852+0000)
>
> Riot practically always makes the release skin either 520RP or 975RP.  don't know of a case where a champion's release skin has been more than either of these.

Umm, dude, have you been living under a rock for the past year? Practically every champion who has been released since Kindred has had a 1350 skin. Just think about it:

Shadowfire Kindred - 1350 RP
Voidbringer Illaoi - 1350 RP
High Noon Jhin - 1350 RP
Ashen Lord Aurelion Sol - 1350 RP
Freljord Taliyah - 1350 RP
Candy King Ivern - 1350 RP

The only exception was Sir Kled, but I think they actually said that it was a mistake and the release price was an error, but as people has already bought the skin they had to keep it at 975 or some shit like that.

Anyway, the new Camille skin has already been confirmed as an epic skin, which is 1350. Case closed.
This. But Sir Kled was 975RP in PBE, so no mistake there. I think there was a pricing mistake on his release article though.

Release skins are 975RP or 1350RP. Also, since skins don't go on sale on release anymore, the bundles have gone up in price. Out of the champions released this year, I think there has only been 1 or 2 with a release skin of 975RP, the rest have been 1350RP.
